com.google.android.agera

Class Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.agera.Functions

  • public final class Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for obtaining Function instances.

    • Method Summary

      static <T> Function<java.lang.Throwable,Result<T>> failedResult()
      Returns a Function that wraps a Throwable in a Result.failure(Throwable)).

      Starts describing Function that starts with a single item.

      Starts describing a Function that starts with a List of items.
      static <T> Function<T,T> identityFunction()
      Returns a Function that passes on the Function input as output.
      static <F,T> Function<F,T> staticFunction(T object)
      Returns a Function that returns object as the result of each Function.apply(TFrom) function call.
      static <F,T> Function<F,T> supplierAsFunction(Supplier<? extends T> supplier)
      Returns a Function that returns the result of supplier as the result of each Function.apply(TFrom) function call.
